item.text: In those days Israel had no king. And in those days the Danite tribe was looking for a place to settle because at that time they did not yet have a place to call their own among the tribes of Israel.

The <st data-num="01121 01835">Danites</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">sent out</st> from their <st data-num="07098" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="04940" class="">tribe</st> <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">representatives</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01121 02428">capable</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st><n id="2" /> from <st data-num="06881" class="">Zorah</st> and <st data-num="0847" class="">Eshtaol</st>, to <st data-num="07270" class="">spy out</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> and <st data-num="02713" class="">explore</st> it. They <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them, “<st data-num="01980" class="">Go</st>, <st data-num="02713" class="">explore</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.” They <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> to the <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraimite</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st> and <st data-num="03885 08033">spent the night</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">at</st> <st data-num="04318" class="">Micah’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>.<n id="3" />

As <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">approached</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04318" class="">Micah’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>, <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> <st data-num="05234" class="">recognized</st> the <st data-num="06963" class="">accent</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="05288" class="">young</st> <st data-num="03881" class="">Levite</st>. So they <st data-num="05493" class="">stopped</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to him, “<st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> you <st data-num="01988" class="">here</st>? <st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> are <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">doing</st> in <st data-num="02088" class="">this place</st>? <st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> is your business <st data-num="06311" class="">here</st>?”<n id="4" />

He <st data-num="0559 0413">told</st> them <st data-num="02090 02088">what</st> <st data-num="04318" class="">Micah</st> had <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> for him, saying,<n id="1" /> “He <st data-num="07936" class="">hired</st> me, and I <st data-num="01961" class="">became</st> his <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>.”

They <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to him, “<st data-num="07592 04994">Seek</st> a <st data-num="0430" class="">divine oracle</st> for us,<n id="1" /> so we can <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> if <st data-num="0587" class="">we</st> will <st data-num="06743" class="">be successful</st> on our <st data-num="01870 0834 01980 05921">mission</st>.”<n id="2" />
The priest said to them, “Go with confidence. The Lord will be with you on your mission.”

So the five men journeyed on and arrived in Laish. They noticed that the people there were living securely, like the Sidonians do, undisturbed and unsuspecting. No conqueror was troubling them in any way. They lived far from the Sidonians and had no dealings with anyone.

When the Danites <st data-num="0935" class="">returned</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> their <st data-num="0251" class="">tribe</st><n id="1" /> in <st data-num="06881" class="">Zorah</st> and <st data-num="0847" class="">Eshtaol</st>, their <st data-num="0251" class="">kinsmen</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">asked</st> them, “<st data-num="04100" class="">How</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">did it go</st>?”<n id="3" />

They <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="06965" class="">Come on</st>, let’s <st data-num="05927 05921">attack</st> them,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st><n id="2" /> we <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> their <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="02009" class="">and</st> it is <st data-num="03966" class="">very</st> <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st>. <st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> seem <st data-num="02814" class="">lethargic</st>,<n id="3" /> but <st data-num="0408" class="">don’t</st> <st data-num="06101" class="">hesitate</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="01980 0935">invade</st> and <st data-num="03423" class="">conquer</st><n id="5" /> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.
When you invade, you will encounter unsuspecting people. The land is wide! God is handing it over to you—a place that lacks nothing on earth!”
So 600 Danites, fully armed, set out from Zorah and Eshtaol.

They <st data-num="05927" class="">went up</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="07157" class="">Kiriath Jearim</st> in <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>. (<st data-num="05921 03651 05704">To</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> is <st data-num="07121" class="">called</st> <st data-num="04265" class="">Camp of Dan</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02009" class="">It</st> is <st data-num="0310" class="">west</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="07157" class="">Kiriath Jearim</st>.)

From <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> they <st data-num="05674" class="">traveled through</st> the <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraimite</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st> and <st data-num="0935" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">at</st> <st data-num="04318" class="">Micah’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>.

The <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> who had <st data-num="01980" class="">gone</st> to <st data-num="07270" class="">spy out</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03919" class="">Laish</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="06030 0559">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> their <st data-num="0251" class="">kinsmen</st>,<n id="2" /> “Do you <st data-num="03045" class="">realize</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> inside <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">houses</st> <st data-num="03426" class="">are</st> an <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st>, some <st data-num="08655" class="">personal idols</st>, a <st data-num="06459" class="">carved image</st>, and a <st data-num="04541" class="">metal image</st>? <st data-num="03045" class="">Decide</st> <st data-num="06258" class="">now</st> <st data-num="04100" class="">what</st> you want to <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st>.”

They <st data-num="05493" class="">stopped</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>, <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">inside</st> the <st data-num="05288" class="">young</st> <st data-num="03881" class="">Levite’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> (<st data-num="01004" class="">which</st> belonged to <st data-num="04318" class="">Micah</st>),<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="07592" class="">asked</st> him <st data-num="07965" class="">how</st> he was <st data-num="07965" class="">doing</st>.<n id="3" />

Meanwhile the <st data-num="08337 03967" class="">600</st> <st data-num="0376 0834 01121 01835">Danites</st>, <st data-num="02296" class="">fully</st> <st data-num="03627 04421">armed</st>, <st data-num="05324" class="">stood</st> at the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> to the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st>.<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> who had <st data-num="01980" class="">gone</st> to <st data-num="07270" class="">spy out</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="05927 0935 08033">broke in</st> and <st data-num="03947" class="">stole</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="06456" class="">carved image</st>, the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st>, the <st data-num="08655" class="">personal idols</st>, and the <st data-num="04541" class="">metal image</st>, while the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> was <st data-num="05324" class="">standing</st> at the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> to the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> with the <st data-num="08337 03967" class="">600</st> <st data-num="02296" class="">fully</st> <st data-num="03627 04421">armed</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st>.<n id="2" />

When <st data-num="0428" class="">these men</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">broke into</st> <st data-num="04318" class="">Micah’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> and <st data-num="03947" class="">stole</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="06459" class="">carved image</st>, the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st>, the <st data-num="08655" class="">personal idols</st>, and the <st data-num="04541" class="">metal image</st>, the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them, “<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> are <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">doing</st>?”

They <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to him, “<st data-num="02790" class="">Shut up</st>! <st data-num="07760" class="">Put</st> your <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> your <st data-num="06310" class="">mouth</st> and <st data-num="01980" class="">come</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> us! You can <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> our <st data-num="01" class="">adviser</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>. Wouldn’t it <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="02896" class="">better</st> to <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> for a <st data-num="04940" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israelite</st> <st data-num="07626" class="">tribe</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">than</st> for just <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">family</st>?”<n id="2" />
The priest was happy. He took the ephod, the personal idols, and the carved image and joined the group.
They turned and went on their way, but they walked behind the children, the cattle, and their possessions.

After <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> had <st data-num="07368" class="">gone a good distance</st> from <st data-num="04318" class="">Micah’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>, <st data-num="04318" class="">Micah’s</st> <st data-num="0582 0834 01004 0834 05973 01004">neighbors</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02199" class="">gathered together</st> and <st data-num="01692" class="">caught up with</st> the <st data-num="01121 01835">Danites</st>.

When they <st data-num="07121" class="">called out</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01121 01835">Danites</st>, the Danites<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05437" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">around</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="04318" class="">Micah</st>, “<st data-num="04100" class="">Why</st> have you <st data-num="03588 02199">gathered together</st>?”

He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “You <st data-num="03947" class="">stole</st> my <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st>, as well as this <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>, and then <st data-num="01980" class="">went away</st>. <st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> do I have <st data-num="05750" class="">left</st>? <st data-num="04100" class="">How</st> can you have the <st data-num="02088" class="">audacity</st> to <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me, ‘<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> do you want?’”<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="01121 01835">Danites</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “<st data-num="0408" class="">Don’t</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">say</st> another <st data-num="06963" class="">word</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">to</st> us, <st data-num="06435" class="">or</st> some <st data-num="04751 05315">very angry</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="06293" class="">attack</st> you, and <st data-num="05315" class="">you</st> and your <st data-num="05315 01004">family</st> will <st data-num="0622" class="">die</st>.”<n id="2" />
The Danites went on their way; when Micah realized they were too strong to resist, he turned around and went home.
Now the Danites took what Micah had made, as well as his priest, and came to Laish, where the people were undisturbed and unsuspecting. They struck them down with the sword and burned the city.

<st data-num="0369" class="">No one</st> <st data-num="05337" class="">came to the rescue</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="01931" class="">city</st><n id="1" /> was <st data-num="07350" class="">far</st> from <st data-num="06721" class="">Sidon</st><n id="2" /> and they had <st data-num="0369" class="">no</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">dealings</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> <st data-num="0120" class="">anyone</st>.<n id="3" /> The <st data-num="01931" class="">city</st><n id="4" /> was in a <st data-num="06010 0834">valley</st> near <st data-num="01050" class="">Beth Rehob</st>. The Danites<n id="5" /> <st data-num="01129" class="">rebuilt</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> and <st data-num="03427" class="">occupied</st> it.

They <st data-num="07121 08034">named</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">it</st> <st data-num="01835" class="">Dan</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">after</st> their <st data-num="01835 01">ancestor</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> was one of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel’s</st> <st data-num="03205" class="">sons</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0199" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city’s</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> <st data-num="07223" class="">used to</st> be <st data-num="03919" class="">Laish</st>.

The <st data-num="01121 01835">Danites</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">worshiped</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="06459" class="">carved image</st>. <st data-num="03129" class="">Jonathan</st>, <st data-num="01121" class="">descendant</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="01647" class="">Gershom</st>, <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="01931 01121">and his descendants</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="01961" class="">served</st> as <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st> for the <st data-num="07626" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01839" class="">Dan</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st> of the <st data-num="01540 0776">exile</st>.
They worshiped Micah’s carved image the whole time God’s authorized shrine was in Shiloh.
